thread.title: admin at CTC TAS
thread.title_full: Servcorp reviewed by admin at CTC TAS

author: admin at CTC TAS
title: admin at CTC TAS
text:
Our customers whose phone calls go through to Bethany, comment so enthusiastically about Bethany's work. We glow in their comments.
We know that Bethany does WONDERFUL work for our small organisation.
From our organisational perspective, we deal most often with Holly. Holly deserves compliments too. Our view is that happy clients equal a good life. Our thanks to Bethany and Holly for giving us happy clients.
